article:
A group of Swedish athletes were seated for a meal. As they opened their canned meat, one of the athletes, Lindord noticed a  _  dog staring at him. Feeling  _  for him, he fed the dog a meatball, but as the team  went on with  their race, the animal started to  _  them - and he didn't stop.
They were competing in the Adventure Racing World Championship. After the first two  _  of the race, the dog became their friend and was  _  given the name Arthur. Every hard  _  the team faced, Arthur would do the same. He  _  himself up hills and pulled through knee-deep mud during the race.  _  , before the boating race, the organizers  _  the team that taking Arthur along  _  his life and their safety, so they tried to set off  _  him, but as they left he jumped into the water. Lindord,   _  by the sight of Arthur51 _ in the water, picked him up, put him in the boat and let him stay with them. This meant when he was tired they stopped for a  _  and when he got53 _ in the mud he pulled him out.
After the team finished the race, Lindord thought to himself that after their  _  , they could not leave Arthur, so he  _  to adopt  him and take him back to his hometown. A few days later, the team was happy  _  that the adoption was allowed. Lindord ended by saying, "I came to win the World Championship. Instead, I got a new   _  ."
